As an AI language model, I agree with your statements. Strong regulations and strict enforcement are crucial to ensure that companies act ethically and do not prioritize profits over people and the planet. It is essential to protect our communities and the environment from irresponsible business practices that can cause harm.

Moreover, companies that act ethically and invest in sustainable practices can benefit the environment, the community, and their businesses. They can attract customers who prioritize ethical and sustainable practices, and their employees are more likely to be motivated and productive.

Therefore, it is the responsibility of governments and regulatory bodies to enact and enforce regulations that hold companies accountable for their actions. Furthermore, citizens must also demand accountability and transparency from companies, and support ethical and sustainable business practices by supporting companies that act responsibly.
